subject_information.comments:
I was confused with the instructions because I was not sure of the roles between the listener and the speaker. One way for me this would be easier to understand is perhaps if there was a table or chart that had all the roles of the Listener on one side and all the parts of the speaker in the respective order on the other side =|= 
 It would look like this:
          Speaker         |         Listener
describe object       | identify object
can use chat box     | can use chat box
cannot see curtain  |  can see curtain

But maybe I am the only one with this confusion.
subject_information.strategy: pretty straight forward. The first one had to figure out what I was doing and there may have been a language barrier but it all worked out fine in the end.
